snippet: A two-level residence at the landmark Plaza, with its own street-level entrance and private elevator, was the sale of the week.
abstract: Big Ticket column; two-level, eight-room maisonette at landmark Plaza Hotel near Central Park is highest residential sale of the week in New York City, closing at $17.25 million.
lead_paragraph: A two-level residence at the landmark Plaza, with its own street-level entrance and private elevator, was the sale of the week.

headline.main: Maisonette at the Plaza for $17.25 Million
